org.pepstock.charba.client

Class Charts

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.Charts

  • public final class Charts
extends Object
    Is a static reference which collects all chart instances to be able to enable global plugins.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
